name: Nomad Cave
description: Set in a prime location of Stockholm, Lodge32 Hostel puts everything the city has to offer just outside your doorstep. The hotel offers a high standard of service and amenities to suit the individual needs of all travelers. Facilities like free Wi-Fi in all rooms, express check-in/check-out, luggage storage, Wi-Fi in public areas, family room are readily available for you to enjoy. Designed for comfort, selected guestrooms offer internet access wireless, non smoking rooms, heating, television, satellite/cable TV to ensure a restful night. The hotel offers various recreational opportunities. Discover all Stockholm has to offer by making Lodge32 Hostel your base.priceline.com

name: HomeX Hotel for Gamers
description: Located in Stockholm, 11 km from Friends Arena, HomeX Gamers Hotel provides accommodation with a terrace, free private parking, a restaurant and a bar. The property is close to several well-known attractions, less than 1 km from Stockholm Central Station, a 1-minute walk from Royal Swedish Opera and 200 metres from Museum of Medieval Stockholm. The Royal Palace is 500 metres from the hotel and Vasa Museum is 15 km away. Guests at the hotel will be able to enjoy activities in and around Stockholm, like cycling. Popular points of interest near HomeX Gamers Hotel include Sergels Torg Square, Stureplan and Army Museum. The nearest airport is Bromma Stockholm Airport, 17 km from the accommodation.

name: Skanstulls Boutique Hostel
description: This modern hostel is in vibrant Södermalm, 150 metres from Skanstull Metro Station. It offers a guest kitchen and free WiFi. Stockholm Central Station is 4 metro stops away. All rooms at Skanstulls Boutique Hostel feature bright, unique décor and either private or shared bathrooms. Skanstulls Boutique Hostel collaborates with a café (Lilla Caféet på Söder) located in the neighbour buildning (Ringvägen 131) where all the guests get 10% off on their meny. Free pasta and spices are available in the guest kitchen. Other facilities include a dining area, small library, luggage room and laundry. Tele2 Arena and the Ericsson Globe are 2 metro stops from Skanstulls Boutique Hostel.
